item.title: Keycloak SSO
item.description: When user configures Wildfly to authenticate user to Keycloak SSO, HAL supports the authentication the following way: HAL redirects the login attempt to keycloak server, if successful redirect back to HAL. Provide the logout option in HAL to call the logout page on keycloak. This is displayed under the username in the header section. Displays basic Keycloak settings in the Access Control page. Displays a link to user profile on Keycloak server.
